item.description:
I plan on riding tomorrow afternoon, weather permitting. There is a 30% possibility of snow in the morning, but if that doesn't happen, the ride is on b/c it is supposed to clear in the afternoon and be partly cloudy

Route Summary:

Starting in Lexington we head out to Bedford, stop at Great Meadows in Concord, then head towards Walden pond and down to the Weston Green and by the Cambridge Res in Waltham

The route
http://goo.gl/maps/QihVN

 

Riders should plan to meet at 1:15 pm and be ready to ride around 1:30 pm

We should return to the Depot  area around 4:00 pm if we can keep the 12 to 15 pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point
Depot Square, Lexington MA

Stopping points

Great Meadows National Wildlife Refuge

There is all day parking lot at the depot btw.


What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
minimum 1 full water bottles

bring snacks


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

http://files.meetup.com/482869/LexingtonConcordLincolnWeston29.txt
item.name: Lexington, Concord, Weston 29 miler (weather permitting)
